messageBody:
> Interesting. I tend to stay away from GUI programming so I only just
> now noticed this class mentioned in an article on IBM's Java site.
> Check it out:
>
> http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/api/java/awt/Robot.html
>
> Has anyone here built anything off of this for unit or functional GUI
> testing?

I haven't tried this directly, but I have experience in pixel-based GUI test
automation. Unless you have very high confidence that screens will get to a
stable state quickly, there's little point. Maintenance of the test cases is
a nightmare.

Of course, if someone out there is clever enough to have done this well, I'd
love to know about it. I could always use more tricks in my bag. :)
